messages.content: You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What are your hours?
We are open daily from 10 AM to 10 PM. 🕙
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
Do you offer vegetarian options?
Yes, we have Super Greens, Veggie Spring Rolls, and Eggplant Tofu. 🥦
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
Tell me about Orange Chicken.
Orange Chicken is our signature dish—crispy, tangy, and full of flavor! 🍊🐔
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What comes in a Bowl?
A Bowl includes 1 entree and 1 side. A simple, delicious option! 🍚
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
Do you serve gluten-free options?
While we do not have certified gluten-free dishes, you can enjoy Super Greens and White Steamed Rice. Please check with our staff for details. 🥗
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What’s in the Honey Walnut Shrimp?
Honey Walnut Shrimp is sweet, crunchy, and topped with candied walnuts for a perfect blend of flavors. 🍤🍯
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
How spicy is the Kung Pao Chicken?
Kung Pao Chicken has a medium spice level with chili peppers and peanuts for a flavorful kick. 🌶️🥜
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What’s your most popular item?
Orange Chicken is our best-seller—crispy, tangy, and irresistible! 🍊🐔
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
Do you have family meal options?
Yes, our Family Feast includes 3 large entrees and 2 large sides, perfect for sharing! 🍽️
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What’s the difference between a Plate and a Bigger Plate?
A Plate includes 2 entrees and 1 side, while a Bigger Plate gives you 3 entrees and 1 side. More food, more joy! 🍚🍗
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
Are there seasonal items?
Yes, we frequently introduce seasonal dishes! Check our website or ask in-store for current options. 🗓️
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What’s your healthiest option?
Super Greens is the healthiest choice—packed with broccoli, kale, and cabbage. 🥬🥦
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What’s in the Black Pepper Angus Steak?
Black Pepper Angus Steak features tender Angus beef, broccoli, and mushrooms in a savory black pepper sauce. 🥩🍄
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
Do you offer rewards?
Yes, join our Panda Rewards program to earn points on every order. 🐼🎁
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What’s in the Super Greens?
Super Greens include a healthy mix of broccoli, kale, and cabbage—lightly seasoned and steamed. 🥦🥬
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
Can I customize my order?
Absolutely! You can mix and match entrees and sides to create your perfect meal. 🍽️
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What are your drink options?
We offer fountain drinks, bottled water, and specialty teas. 🥤
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What’s the calorie count for Orange Chicken?
Orange Chicken has 490 calories per serving. Delicious and satisfying! 🍊🐔
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What’s your policy on allergens?
We provide allergen information in-store and online. Please ask our staff for help. 🛑
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What sides do you offer?
Our sides include Chow Mein, Fried Rice, Steamed Rice, and Super Greens. 🍚🍜
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What’s in the Chow Mein?
Chow Mein is made with stir-fried noodles, onions, celery, and cabbage. A classic favorite! 🍜
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What’s the price of the Bigger Plate?
The Bigger Plate is $13.50 and includes 3 entrees and 1 side. A feast for one! 🍽️
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
Is your food halal?
Our food is not certified halal, but we aim to accommodate dietary needs where possible. Please ask in-store. 🙏
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What’s the difference between Fried Rice and Steamed Rice?
Fried Rice is stir-fried with eggs, peas, and carrots, while Steamed Rice is plain and fluffy. 🍚🥕
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What are premium entrees?
Premium entrees include Honey Walnut Shrimp and Black Pepper Angus Steak. They have a small extra charge due to premium ingredients. 🍤🥩
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
Do you have vegan options?
Yes, we offer Eggplant Tofu and Super Greens for plant-based diets. 🥗
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
Can I add extra sauce to my order?
Of course! Just ask our staff, and we’ll make it saucy for you. 🍶
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What’s your most unique dish?
Honey Walnut Shrimp is a fan favorite with its sweet and crunchy flavors. A must-try! 🍤🍯
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
How big are your portions?
Our portions are generous! A single entree and side can easily satisfy most appetites. 🍚🍗
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What’s in the Beijing Beef?
Beijing Beef is crispy beef with bell peppers and onions in a tangy-sweet sauce. 🍖🌶️
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
Do you offer discounts?
We occasionally have promotions and deals—check our app or website for the latest offers. 💸
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
Can I get a refund if I’m not satisfied?
Yes, we value your satisfaction. Please speak to the manager for any concerns. 🙌
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What’s in the Veggie Spring Roll?
Veggie Spring Rolls are filled with cabbage, carrots, and celery in a crispy wrapper. 🥕
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
Can I buy gift cards?
Yes, we offer gift cards for any occasion. A perfect gift for Panda Express fans! 🎁🐼
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What’s the spiciest dish on your menu?
Kung Pao Chicken and Beijing Beef have a good kick, but Kung Pao is spicier. 🌶️🥜
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
Do you recycle your packaging?
We strive to use eco-friendly packaging. Check for recycling symbols on our containers. ♻️
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
How can I give feedback?
We’d love to hear from you! Visit our website or speak to a manager in-store. 💬
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What’s in the String Bean Chicken Breast?
String Bean Chicken Breast is stir-fried with string beans, onions, and a mild garlic sauce. 🥗🍗
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What’s your best dessert?
Try our Apple Pie Roll, fruity, and delicious. 🍪
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What’s the price for Honey Walnut Shrimp?
Honey Walnut Shrimp is $8.50 as a premium entree. Worth every penny! 🍤🍯
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What makes Panda Express special?
Panda Express combines fresh, bold flavors with quick service, making every meal memorable. 🐼
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
How long does it take to prepare an order?
Most orders are ready within minutes, ensuring you get your food hot and fresh! 🍽️
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What’s your policy on refunds?
We offer refunds if you’re not satisfied with your meal. Just let the manager know. 🙌
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What’s in the SweetFire Chicken Breast?
SweetFire Chicken Breast is a sweet and spicy dish with pineapple and peppers. 🍍🌶️
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What’s the most popular side?
Chow Mein is a fan favorite—flavorful, filling, and pairs well with any entree. 🍜
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
Do you offer low-calorie options?
Yes, Super Greens and Steamed Rice are great low-calorie choices. 🥦
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What’s the best combo meal?
A Plate with Orange Chicken and Chow Mein is a classic combo loved by many. 🍊🍜
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
Are your dishes nut-free?
Many of our dishes are nut-free, but Kung Pao Chicken contains peanuts. Please check with our staff for specific allergen details. 🥜
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
Do you have dairy-free options?
Yes, many of our dishes are dairy-free, including Orange Chicken and Super Greens. Please double-check with our staff. 🥗
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
Can I eat here if I have a peanut allergy?
While we do have dishes without peanuts, cross-contact is possible. Please let our staff know about your allergy. 🛑
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What’s safe for someone with gluten intolerance?
Steamed White Rice and Super Greens are naturally gluten-free options. Always check with staff for any concerns. 🍚
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
Do you have low-carb options for gym-goers?
Yes! Super Greens and Grilled Teriyaki Chicken are great low-carb choices for a healthy meal. 🥦🍗
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What’s the best high-protein dish?
Grilled Teriyaki Chicken and Broccoli Beef are both excellent high-protein options for gym enthusiasts. 💪🍖
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
Do your sauces contain soy?
Yes, many of our sauces contain soy. If you have a soy allergy, please inform our staff before ordering. 🛑
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What’s the healthiest post-gym meal?
Super Greens with Grilled Teriyaki Chicken is a perfect post-gym meal—high in protein and nutrients. 🏋️‍♂️🥗
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
Can I get extra protein in my meal?
Absolutely! You can double up on entrees like Grilled Teriyaki Chicken for more protein. 🍗💪
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
Do you offer allergen information?
Yes, we provide a full allergen guide in-store and online to help you choose the right meal. 🛑📄
